stories.text:
Hi HN,

I've built this new tool that helps property developers sell their units simultaneously and simplifies the generation of documents (sales offers/ purchase agreements etc ..) it has also some basic activity tracking, access control and import/export features.

This was built using Flask, Vue/Vuetify, Postgresql, and websockets.

I have multiple clients who are very happy with this service and decided to extend it further.

Feel free to drop me any questions you may have.

Demo link: https://demo.mixedcrm.com

Best,
stories.title: Show HN: Mixedcrm.com Real Estate sales and automation CRM

stories.text:
Before USB-C there were many USB-cables that had no data-connection. This can be a security feature against hardware attacks.

I've searched for USB-C without data but I haven't found anything yet.

One could block D+/- on a USB-A to USB-C cable of course, but I wonder if commercially available USB-C to USB-C cables don't exist at all.

An adapter for public charging etc. would be a nice gadget for next christmas. Go nuts, product creators! :D
stories.title: Ask HN: Do USB-C cables without data channel exist?
